ygData.subject: Re: My overcrowding solutuion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ok, so that ll force people to move around if they want to get all 8 items.  Gotcha.  Still, I can see people camping one spot until they get an item,
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 27 Jan 2000, Papa Legba wrote:
> >
> > If the named mobs were all over the place, then the container
> > and widget system is redundant. :)
>
> I dont quite understand. Maybe I wasn't clear, I meant the widgets are
> on named all over the same dungeon, thus making pulling them to one room
> impossible. I see a dungeon like Upper Guk (dont know lower, my highest
> lvl char is 20 and played him last in June) with maybe 8 named mobs
> spread all over the place. No way you could pull them through all the

Ok, so that'll force people to move around if they want to get
all 8 items. Gotcha. Still, I can see people camping one
spot until they get an item, moving on to the next until they
get that item, etc. I don't think they'll systematically
clear as they sweep through the dungeon.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
